text: Flockstars is a British television series that began on ITV from 30 July to 17 September 2015 hosted by Gabby Logan. The series was cancelled after just one series. ==Format== The show followed celebrities as they tried to master the art of sheep herding. ==Celebrities== {| class="wikitable" style="margin: auto; text-align: center;" |- !
